description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file to a suspicious target folder
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File Download Via Bitsadmin To A Suspicious Target Folder
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\bitsadmin.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"bitsadmin.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/transfer\ *" OR "*\ \/create\ *" OR "*\ \/addfile\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\\Perflogs*" OR "*\:\\ProgramData\\*" OR "*\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Roaming\\*" OR "*\\Desktop\\*" OR "*%ProgramData%*" OR "*%public%*"))
